name: XWUI Statistic Component
description: Statistic display component for showing counts, metrics, and numerical data. Supports title, prefix, suffix, value formatting, precision, and custom styling. Useful for dashboards and data displays.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

title.description: Title text to display above the value

prefix.description: Prefix element or HTML string to display before value

suffix.description: Suffix element or HTML string to display after value

valueStyle.description: Custom CSS styles for the value

precision.description: Number of decimal places for numeric values

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the statistic

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Statistic value to display (number or string)

formatter.description: Custom formatter function (not serializable in JSON)
